purpleculture_pinyin:
liào
to watch from a height or distance; to survey
смотреть с высоты или с расстояния; делать обзор
rtega_mnemonic:
瞭瞭RSbright, clear, clear-sighted
  • eye 目 seeing the sun reflecting of something wet 尞: bright
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 尞 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
瞭哨 [ liào shào ]: to go on sentry duty; to stand guard
瞭望 [ liào wàng ]: to watch from a height or distance; to keep a lookout
瞭望哨 [ liào wàng shào ]: lookout post
瞭望台 [ liào wàng tái ]: observation tower; lookout tower
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 尞 [ liào ] fuel used for sacrifices
heisig_chinese_memo: I paint a huge eye on the side of my pup tent. Can't comprehend why? – It’s obvious: when I’m at the camping site it makes it obvious which tent is mine so I can quickly locate it.
heisig_constituent: obvious, eye, pup tent, large, St. Bernard, sun, day, small, little
koohiiStory1: Open your eyes, it's obvious that not all of us can fit into that small puptent!
koohiiStory2: It´s obvious that the pup tent with a huge eye on the side belongs to the dark lord Sauron.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Rub charcoal under your eyes if you want to see clearly. Sports players also rub charcoal under their eyes to see nice and clear in the bright sun.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You can even rub charcoal in your eyes if you really want to clear them up, but you should probably only do this under the supervision of your eye doctor.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You have to have clear vision because you're about to go out in your row (りょう) boat. The light off the water shines right into your eyes and you need the charcoal to clear that up for you. Otherwise you'll end up crashing into the shore or going over a waterfall to your death.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine how dangerous it would be not to have clear vision while you row around in a row boat. You might even smack yourself in the face with your own oars.
Ru_Notes: あきらか: чаще 明らか
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 并, 小 (маленький), 日 (день), 目 (глаз)

Kanshudo_mnemonic: if it's complementary (尞) to your eye (目) it's plain

From Lou ":" chest positive, then the eye Yan; chest is not correct, the eye having poor eyesight Yan "" poor eyesight "and" a "relative, that the eyes of absence. Another example is "Selected Works. Song Yu "Goddess Fu": "The eyes are bright and brilliant, so beautiful and impressive."

" A " means clear and clear. Such as "Lun Heng. "Zi Ji": "Speaking to the ear, then things are in the heart." "New Tang Book. "The Biography of Wei Si Li": "The deceased is returned to the government, and the living is gracious, and the world is clear. It is not your Majesty's intention to know that you are sinning."

humanum_short_description_en: From the " head " to the sound of "尞". The original meaning is bright eyes.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「尞」聲。本義是眼睛明亮。《玉篇．目部》：「瞭，目明也。」如《孟子．離婁上》：「胸中正，則眸子瞭焉；胸中不正，則眸子眊焉。」「眊」與「瞭」相對，表示眼睛失神。又如《文選．宋玉〈神女賦〉》：「眸子炯其精朗兮，瞭多美而可觀。」

　　「瞭」表示明白、清楚。如《論衡．自紀》：「言瞭於耳，則事味於心。」《新唐書．韋嗣立傳》：「死者還官，生者霑恩，則天下瞭然，知向所陷罪，非陛下意也。」

　　「瞭」還表示遠望、瞭望。如明代戚繼光《紀效新書．治水兵篇》：「每更用兵二名，一名船頭遠視，一名船尾高瞭。」《明史．余子俊傳》：「又於崖砦空處築短牆，橫一斜二如箕狀，以瞭敵避射。」
humanum_short_description: 從「目」，「尞」聲。本義是眼睛明亮。

【午集中】【目字部】　瞭； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页817第26
【廣韻】盧鳥切【集韻】【韻會】朗鳥切【正韻】盧皎切，?音了。【廣韻】目睛明也。【周禮·春官·大師】眂瞭三百人。【註】瞭，目明者。【孟子】胷中正則眸子瞭焉。　又【師曠·禽經】瞭曰鷂。【張華註】能遠視也。又【楚辭·九辯】瞭冥冥而薄天。【註】瞭，音了，一音杳。亦通作杳。　又【廣韻】落蕭切。【集韻】【韻會】憐蕭切【正韻】連條切，?了平聲。義同。

瞭
形声字。目表意,其形像眼睛,表示眼睛明亮;寮( lido )表声,寮有火光照耀而通明之义,表示瞭是眼睛明亮。本义是眼
晴明亮。引申指远望。
远望;从高处往远处看:~望。
liào
~哨 ~望
瞭 瞭
隶
Вверх
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение глаза, его форма подобны глазам, что означает, что глаза яркие; lido (lido) означает, что есть огонь и ярко сияющий свет, что означает, что глаза яркие.
Первоначальный смысл - ясные и светлые глаза.
В общем, смотрите далеко.
Взгляд издалека; взгляд вдаль с высоты: ~ Ван.
~ свистеть ~ смотреть
Вверх
писец
liào, liǎo
1) liào смотреть вдаль
2) liǎo трад. 了 (уяснить, понятный)
Radicals: 目, 尞  (eye, charcoal)
Meaning Mnemonic
Rub charcoal under your eyes if you want to see clearly. Sports players also rub charcoal under their eyes to see nice and clear in the bright sun.
You can even rub charcoal in your eyes if you really want to clear them up, but you should probably only do this under the supervision of your eye doctor.
Reading Mnemonic
You have to have clear vision because you're about to go out in your row (りょう) boat. The light off the water shines right into your eyes and you need the charcoal to clear that up for you. Otherwise you'll end up crashing into the shore or going over a waterfall to your death.
Imagine how dangerous it would be not to have clear vision while you row around in a row boat. You might even smack yourself in the face with your own oars.
